title: Social Science Learning Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing the 5P-5E Integrated Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science knowledge and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: A program for undergraduate social science students/job seekers conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment. Holistically develop academic achievement, creative thinking, and research competencies through research-based pedagogy

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 20% improvement in academic performance through social science projects applying the 5P Model.
Using the 5E Modelâ€™s inquiry phases (Engage-Explore-Explain-Elaborate-Evaluate), learners improve by an average of 15% or more across eight indicators of creative thinking.

Through integrated model-based research activities, learners show a 30% improvement in research characteristics (self-directed inquiry, critical analysis, collaborative skills) compared to pre-assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
